raw_body:
WILSON – CHRISTOPHER SURENDRAN,​ called to rest 29.04.2024. Precious son of (late) Thomas Wilson & Yogam Wilson,​ beloved Husband of Raji,​ Loving Father of Rishan,​ brother of Prem &Yogen,​ brother-in-Law of Kasturi & Vanathi,​ uncle to Amrith,​ Ashvindh,​ Anushi,​ Mathushi & Thanushi. Remains will lie at A F Raymond’s Funeral Parlour,​ Borella. Private viewing for family on the 1st of May. The viewing for the public will be on the 2nd of May from 9 am onwards. There will be a service at the parlour at 3:30 pm on the same day followed by the Interment at 4:30 pm at General Cemetery,​ Borella. Anglican Section. No flowers by request.
028513
